casebody.data:
ERNEST BERGER v. LILA F. WHITEHEAD, joined by her husband, REGINALD C. WHITEHEAD. 19 So. (2nd) 869

January Term, 1945

January 9, 1945 Division A Rehearing denied January 26, 1945 Cooper & Cooper, for appellant. William C. McLean, for appellees. PER CURIAM:

From our study of the evidence we are convinced that the record is free from reversible error.

The judgment is affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
